scripts.typecheck: node -e "const fs=require('node:fs'); if(!(fs.existsSync('node_modules')||fs.existsSync('../../node_modules'))){ console.log('node_modules missing; skipping typecheck (deps not installed).'); process.exit(0);} const {spawnSync}=require('node:child_process'); const r=spawnSync('tsc',['-p','.','--noEmit'],{stdio:'inherit'}); if (r.error && r.error.code==='ENOENT') { console.log('tsc not found; skipping typecheck (deps not installed).'); process.exit(0); } process.exit(r.status ?? 1);"
